snippet.title: Queer Man Peering - LudoNarraCon trailer
snippet.description:
#indiegame #gayming #ludonarracon
Queer Man Peering Into A Rock Pool.jpg
Demo out now on itch and Steam.
http://fuzzyg.host
A joyful, strange experience in which a middle-aged queer man toddles around an island attempting to re-furnish his empty house.

Trailer music - "Fern Bells" by Magic City Counterpoint

Itch
https://fuzzyghost.itch.io/queer-man-peering-into-a-rock-pool-jpg
Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1711420/Queer_Man_Peering_Into_A_Rock_Pooljpg/
